briefBackground: I'm Cromuel Barut, a web developer during the day and at the same time, a 3rd year college IT student during the night(Mr. Magdaleno). I love researching, solving programming problems, learning technologies and I enjoy coding challenges.
background: I'm currently enrolled at Informatics Baguio to explore my passion in Information Technology. From here, I learned the concepts of programming and became a self-taught student to pursue a career in web development.

As a web developer, learning something new is my hobby, and I always make myself motivated and productive every day. I enjoy exploring technologies, libraries, tricks, techniques, and best practices to build my projects to run efficiently with beautiful, readable, clean code. I always make myself better than yesterday.
When I'm not in front of a computer screen, I'm probably doing household chores, exercising, and petting my dogs.

experiences.role: Currently, I work as a junior developer at a certain company, my role is to take easy to moderate tasks and sometimes hard task, bug fixing(my favorite), improve myself every day to be capable of taking much harder tasks, read the existing code bases of the company and learn a lot about what technologies does the dev team of the company uses. So far, for the past three months, I've worked at the company, I've contributed at least 5 projects.

projects.description: One of my projects I built after finishing a udemy course. DevConnector is a fullstack social media application for developers
A fullstack contact management web application built with the MERN (MongoGin, Express, React, Node) Stack.
A simple MERN stack shopping list app that I built while learning the Reactstrap. Reactstrap is a great library to use bootstrap javascript components in React JS.
A simple fullstack todo list application.
CoronaDot is a web application that tracks the current Covid-19 cases all over the globe.
BT Shoes is a shoe ecommerce web design with clean minimalistic approach.
Royalotel is a hotel landing page website.
